properties.name: Apple Store
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= 2905 E Skyline Dr, Tucson, AZThe only Apple Store in Tucson (not counting authorized independent dealers), it features computers, software, accessories, iPhones, iPods and training services.

properties.name: Arthur C. Pack Park
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Really big baseball fields, desert paths.

properties.name: Barnes & Noble
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= 5130 E. Broadway, Tucson, AZ, 85711, USAA large free-standing book store with a Starbucks inside. Nice selection of merchandise and a very pleasant environment. The coffee shop has AT&T wifi but you have to pay for it which sucks.

properties.name: Borders Books & Music
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= My favorite book store in Tucson now that the Haunted Bookstore is long gone. Great coffee bar too, and the Borders Rewards program gets you lots of perks.

properties.name: Funtasticks Family Fun Park
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Probably the best amusement park in Tucson, Funtasticks offers four acres of mini golf, water rides and go-kart track. Inside is a three-story lasertag arena complete with fog and black light. For two years, the arena hosted the Humane Society\'s Great Animal Rescue: The Quest to Conquer Karkadaan. There is also an extensive concession stand, arcade, batting cages and attractions for younger kids. Pricey but worth it.

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE=

properties.name: Ike's Coffee & Tea
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Locally-owned coffee bar and cafe with a nice selection of light foods as well as drinks. Patio seating. Usually busier at night than in the mornings.

properties.name: La Encantada
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= An upscale indoor-outdoor mall with a variety of specialty shops, restaurants and attractions.

properties.name: Lowes Foothills Cinema
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= 15 theatres with an extensive snack bar, but it\'s pricey. Candy is per bag and you\'ll end up spending as much on food as on tickets. As mall theatres go, however, it\'s generally less crowded than others.

properties.name: Magpie's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Some of the best pizza in Tucson. I recommend the White Pie, which you can also get by the slice.. A nice outdoor patio which often comes with live music.

properties.name: Melting Pot
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Famous for it\'s fondue, wines and OUTRAGEOUS prices. Enjoy. Just not often or you\'ll go broke.

properties.name: Mimi's Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Mimi\'s Cafe, although a national franchise chain, does have a certain charm and good food. Designed like a bistro in the French Quarter of New Orleans, it has an extensive menu and reasonable prices. Outdoor dining also available.

properties.name: Providence Institute
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Offers excellent massage therapy plus yoga and other wellness services. A nice gift shop too.

properties.name: Sears Park
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Little known Sears Park sits behind one of the busiest malls in Tucson, Park Place. It\'s U-shaped and contains baseball diamonds, play systems and lots and lots of grass. A big park with low visitation.

properties.name: Silverbell Nursery
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Nice selection of plants, but lacking on succulents and herbs.

properties.name: Tower Theaters
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Tickets prices here are generally .50 less than any other theater in the Tucson area. The saving extend to the concession stand too, where you can get .00 refills on soft drinks for a full year and everything else is more reasonably priced... At least for a theater. Plus it\'s brand new and state-of-the-art in sound picture and comfort.

properties.name: Western National Parks Association
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= 12880 N Vistoso Village Dr, Oro Valley, AZEstablished in 1938 to aid and promoteeducational and scientific activities of the National Park Service. This beautiful gift shop features jewelry, art, pottery and plenty of educational books.

properties.name: Wilshire Heights Park
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Wilshire Heights Park is a small wedge-shaped park in the neighborhood behind Park Place mall. It has a couple of swing-sets, a small baseball diamond and some picnic tables... But not much else. What it also lacks is people, so it\'s a great place to go if you want some solitude in the middle of the city.

properties.name: Wilshire Heights Park wash
properties.description: Posted by Iphone.qveVTH1h3sMJ3iY/qHHm8O9sFjE= Just a cool little wash.
